page.title: 03Farm Life by Vicki Collin
page.content: My dad is a farmer & he, mum, my sister I live on a 68 acre farm 1 mile from Ambrosden.We have 54 cows, 7 sheep, 9 lambs, 75 hens,7 chicks,8 geese,8ducks, 6 ducklings.It is mainly grassland & sometimes we grow crops of kale& maize. Mum & dad get up at 6 every morning to milk the cows & I get up at 7.Morning milking takes 2 hours as the tanker has to collect the milk to take to London. Evening milking takes 1&3/4 hours then dad comes in & tells us what the day has been like while we have dinner then we watch TV.Usually I take the dogs for a walk.When I get home from school I change, feed the cats & hens & help mum do the goats.At 4.45 I help mum get the cows in & at 5.30 mum & dad start milking.At weekends & holidays I help mum in the mornings & evenings & sometimes I help with the milking.
